wrongFullText:
City Lit Theater has announced casting for its productions of Noel Coward’s Private Lives and Harold Pinter’s Old Times, which will play in rotating repertory. Both productions feature Don Bender and Cameron Feagin in the lead roles, with direction by Terry McCabe.

Private Lives (March 20-May 3) will also feature Maggie Kettering, George Seegebrecht, and Shawna Tucker. The design team will include Tamar Geist (lighting), Thomas Kieffer (costumes), Christopher Kriz, (sound), Grant Sabin (set), and David Yondorf (fight choreography).

Gianine DeFrancesco will join Bender and Feagin in Old Times (March 27-May 3), with the design team including Tamar Geist (lighting), Thomas Kieffer (costumes), and Grant Sabin (set).

For more information, visit www.citylit.org.
